【考法 1】 n. （小的）争吵： a brief petty quarrel or angry outburst
【例】 Like any couple, they have their spats. 像其他夫妻一样，他们也会有争执。‖They were typical sisters, spatting one minute, playing together the next. 她们是典型的姐妹：上一分钟还在吵架，下一分钟又玩在一起了。
【近】 altercation, controversy, disagreement, dispute, imbroglio, quarrel, squabble, tiff, wrangle
【近】 amity, concord, harmony, rapport, rapprochement 和睦，友好

【记】 spit 吐口水，互相吐口水→争吵；debate 争论, 辩论；音：死拍它，死命拍它，网友互相拍
，争吵；音：呸它 争吵
